org.eclipse.viatra.dse.api

Class Strategies

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.dse.api.Strategies

  • public final class Strategies
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for instantiating strategies. To implement a new strategy use the IStrategy interface.

    • Method Summary

      Creates a fixed priority exploration strategy with a depth limit, where a zero or negative depth limit means no depth limit.

    • Method Detail

      • createDfsStrategy

        public static DepthFirstStrategy createDfsStrategy()
        Creates a depth-first search exploration strategy without a depth limit.
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        DepthFirstStrategy

      • createDfsStrategy

        public static DepthFirstStrategy createDfsStrategy(int depthLimit)
        Creates a depth-first search exploration strategy with a depth limit. A negative depth limit means no depth limit, zero means that it will check the initial state.
        Parameters:
        depthLimit -
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        DepthFirstStrategy

      • createFixedPriorityStrategy

        public static FixedPriorityStrategy createFixedPriorityStrategy()
        Creates a fixed priority exploration strategy without a depth limit. It is a depth-first search exploration strategy but from a current state it only explores the activations with the highest priority. Priorities can be defined on the strategy itself.
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        FixedPriorityStrategy

      • createFixedPriorityStrategy

        public static FixedPriorityStrategy createFixedPriorityStrategy(int depthLimit)
        Creates a fixed priority exploration strategy with a depth limit, where a zero or negative depth limit means no depth limit. It is a depth-first search exploration strategy but from a current state it only explores the activations with the highest priority. Priorities can be defined on the strategy itself.
        Parameters:
        depthLimit -
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        FixedPriorityStrategy

      • createBfsStrategy

        public static BreadthFirstStrategy createBfsStrategy()
        Creates a breadth-first search exploration strategy without a depth limit.
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        BreadthFirstStrategy

      • createBfsStrategy

        public static BreadthFirstStrategy createBfsStrategy(int depthLimit)
        Creates a breadth-first search exploration strategy with a depth limit. A zero or negative depth limit means no depth limit.
        Parameters:
        depthLimit -
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        BreadthFirstStrategy

      • creatHillClimbingStrategy

        public static HillClimbingStrategy creatHillClimbingStrategy()
        Creates a hill climbing exploration strategy. By default, it explores all neighborhood states and chooses the best one to continue with until all neighborhood states are dominated by the current state. Other options are available on the strategy.
        Returns:
        The strategy.
        See Also:
        HillClimbingStrategy

      • createBestFirstStrategy

        public static BestFirstStrategy createBestFirstStrategy()
        See BestFirstStrategy.

      • createBestFirstStrategy

        public static BestFirstStrategy createBestFirstStrategy(int depthLimit)
        See BestFirstStrategy.
